original: intros o1 o2 o3 Hosub1 Hosub2 a2 HO2. specialize (Hosub1 a2 HO2) as [a1 [HO1 Hsub1]]. specialize (Hosub2 a2 HO2) as [a3 [HO3 Hsub2]]. apply (osub_Some_inversion o1 a2) in Hsub1 as [a1' [HO1' Hsub1']]. rewrite HO1' in HO1. injection HO1. intros; subst. exists a3. split. auto. apply (sub_transitive a1 a2 a3); auto.
